mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bookings AS b (user_id, admin_id, person_count, room_type_id, stay_time_start, stay_time_end, booking_date) VALUES (#{userId}, #{adminId}, #{personCount}, #{roomType.id}, #{stayTimeStart}, #{stayTimeEnd}, #{bookingDate})
mapper.select: SELECT b.id AS id, b.user_id AS user_id, b.admin_id AS admin_id, b.room_id AS room_id, s.id AS status, b.person_count AS person_count, rt.id AS room_type, b.stay_time_start AS stay_time_start, b.stay_time_end AS stay_time_end, b.booking_date AS booking_date FROM bookings AS b JOIN room_types rt ON b.room_type_id = rt.id JOIN statuses s ON b.status_id = s.id ORDER BY b.user_id
